how do i make a div background the primary color using bootstrap 5? I already have bootstrap installed, just need the code In Bootstrap, you can easily make the div background color as the primary color by applying `bg-primary` class to your div. Here is a simple example: ```html
Your Content Here...
``` Please make sure that the primary color is defined in your bootstrap CSS or custom CSS. Primary color varies based on the theme used in Bootstrap.
summary: How to set div background to primary color using Bootstrap 5
